title: Sooner or Later
description: The sequel to #1 New York Times bestselling authorÂ Debbie Macomber's classic Someday Soon!When stubborn but proper Texas postmistress Letty Madden hires a rough soldier, Jack Murphy, to help her find her brother for the price of one night together, she has no idea that he will fall deeply in love with her.
author: Debbie Macomber
